displayName.english: Be careful to not Crash the crystal!
displayName.german: Achten Sie darauf, den Kristall nicht zu zerbrechen! Be careful to not Crash the cristal!
displayName.french: Attention à ne pas casser le cristal! Be careful to not Crash the cristal!
displayName.italian: Attenzione a non rompere il cristallo! Be careful to not Crash the crystal!
displayName.brazilian: Cuidado para não Quebrar o cristal! Be careful to not Crash the cristal!
displayName.greek: Προσοχή να μην σπάσει ο κρύσταλλος! Be careful to not Crash the crystal!
displayName.latam: ¡Ten cuidado de no romper el cristal! Be careful to not Crash the cristal!
displayName.russian: Будьте осторожны, не 	cломайте кристалл! Be careful to not Crash the cristal!

displayName.english: The legend of the primary colors
displayName.latam: La leyenda de los colores primarios

displayName.english: The right Native American in the right place can make all the difference!
displayName.german: Der richtige amerikanische Ureinwohner am richtigen Ort kann den Unterschied machen!
displayName.french: Le bon Amérindien au bon endroit peut faire toute la différence!
displayName.italian: Il Nativo Americano giusto al posto giusto può fare la differenza.
displayName.brazilian: O Nativo Americano certo no lugar certo pode fazer toda a diferênça!
displayName.greek: Ο κατάλληλος ιθαγενής Αμερικανός στο σωστό μέρος μπορεί να κάνει τη διαφορά!
displayName.latam: ¡El nativo americano adecuado en el lugar correcto puede marcar la diferencia!
displayName.russian: Правильный коренной американец в правильном месте может иметь решающее значение!
